metadata.title: Ondřej Pták | Fullstack Developer
metadata.description: I specialize in designing and building modern, responsive web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences and drive business growth.

description.0: I am a 20 year old Czech Fullstack Developer specializing in creating modern and responsive web applications.
description.1: I have mainly experience with frontend, but I also have some experience with backend, which allows me to better understand the whole application development process.
description.2: Currently, I am working on several projects that I would be happy to show you.

buffet.title: VOŠ a SPŠE | Buffet reservation
buffet.description: I created the entire frontend for the meal reservation system in the school buffet. The project was part of the graduation project at SPŠE and VOŠ in Pilsen 2024/2025.
buffet.detailedDescription: I created the entire frontend for the school buffet meal reservation system. The project was created as part of the graduation project at the SPŠE and VOŠ in Pilsen 2024/2025. It allows users to browse the menu, add items to the cart, and place orders. Administrators can manage the menu, orders. I created the frontend in React with TailwindCSS. The backend was written in PHP by my classmate. The application communicates with the backend via REST API.

pixelverse.title: PixelVerse | Community platform for pixel artists
pixelverse.description: I created a modern community platform for pixel artists that allows sharing creations, commenting on posts, and discovering new works within the pixel art community.
pixelverse.detailedDescription: I created a modern community platform for pixel artists that allows sharing creations, commenting on posts, and discovering new works within the pixel art community. The project was designed with an emphasis on scalability, clean design, and smooth user experience across devices. The application includes a system of user profiles, comments, ratings, and achievements, and thanks to integration with Clerk and Sanity.io, it provides secure authentication and content management.

buffet.description: I created the entire frontend for the meal reservation system in the school buffet. The project was part of the graduation project at VOŠ a SPŠE Plzeň 2024/2025.

pixelverse.title: PixelVerse | Community platform for pixel artists
pixelverse.subtitle: Personal project
pixelverse.description: I created a modern community platform for pixel artists, which allows users to share their art, comment on posts and discover new works within the pixel art community. The project was designed with scalability in mind, clean design and smooth user experience across devices. The application includes user profile system, comments, ratings and achievements, and thanks to integration with Clerk and Sanity.io provides secure authentication and content management.
